mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_jinlong_system_user_examine_record ( user_id, examine_user_id, examine_time, is_pass, description, state ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{examineUserId}, #{examineTime}, #{pass}, #{description}, #{state} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE tbl_jinlong_system_user_examine_record
examine_user_id = #{examineUserId},
examine_time = #{examineTime},
is_pass = #{pass},
description = #{description},
state = #{state}
examine_id = #{examineId}
mapper.select:
SELECT examine_id AS examineId, user_id AS userId, examine_user_id AS examineUserId, examine_time AS examineTime, is_pass AS pass, description AS description, state AS state FROM tbl_jinlong_system_user_examine_record
user_id = #{id}

SELECT examine_id AS examineId, user_id AS userId, examine_user_id AS examineUserId, examine_time AS examineTime, is_pass AS pass, description AS description, state AS state FROM tbl_jinlong_system_user_examine_record ORDER BY examine_id

SELECT examine_id AS examineId, user_id AS userId, examine_user_id AS examineUserId, examine_time AS examineTime, is_pass AS pass, description AS description, state AS state FROM tbl_jinlong_system_user_examine_record ORDER BY examine_id DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT examine_id AS examineId, user_id AS userId, examine_user_id AS examineUserId, examine_time AS examineTime, is_pass AS pass, description AS description, state AS state FROM tbl_jinlong_system_user_examine_record ORDER BY examine_id DESC LIMIT #{count}
